languages.text: Смрад гниющих тел заползает в горло и легкие, покрывая слизистую липкой пленкой.
The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.
languages.original_text: Смрад гниющих тел заползает в горло и легкие, покрывая слизистую липкой пленкой.

traits.locale_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film over your airways' lining.
The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film over your airways' lining.
The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

languages.text: El hedor de los cadáveres en descomposición se adentra en tu garganta y tus pulmones, formando una capa pegajosa en tus vías respiratorias.
languages.original_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

traits.locale_text: El hedor de los cadáveres en descomposición se adentra en tu garganta y tus pulmones, formando una capa pegajosa en tus vías respiratorias.

languages.text: 腐敗した死体の悪臭が喉や肺に忍び寄り、粘着性の膜となって気道を覆う。
languages.original_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

traits.locale_text: 腐敗した死体の悪臭が喉や肺に忍び寄り、粘着性の膜となって気道を覆う。

languages.text: 腐尸的恶臭涌入了你的喉咙和肺部，在你的呼吸道里形成了一层粘稠的薄膜。
languages.original_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

traits.locale_text: 腐尸的恶臭涌入了你的喉咙和肺部，在你的呼吸道里形成了一层粘稠的薄膜。

languages.text: Der Gestank verrottender Leichen erfüllt deine Kehle und Lunge und bildet einen klebrigen Film in deiner Luftröhre.
languages.original_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

traits.locale_text: Der Gestank verrottender Leichen erfüllt deine Kehle und Lunge und bildet einen klebrigen Film in deiner Luftröhre.

languages.text: La puanteur des corps en décomposition s'insinue dans votre gorge et vos poumons, jusqu'à tapisser vos voies respiratoires d'une sorte de pellicule collante.
languages.original_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.

traits.locale_text: La puanteur des corps en décomposition s'insinue dans votre gorge et vos poumons, jusqu'à tapisser vos voies respiratoires d'une sorte de pellicule collante.

languages.text: Çürüyen cesetlerin pis kokusu, boğazına ve ciğerlerine süzülerek solunum yollarını kaplayan yapışkan bir zar oluşturuyor.
languages.original_text: The stench of decaying bodies creeps into your throat and lungs, forming a sticky film lining your airways.
